refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &lpepp; tool prints the linear process equation (LPE) from &infile; to &outfile; in a human readable format. If &outfile; is not present, &cstdout; is used. If &infile; is not present, &cstdin; is used.

refsect1.title: Options
Known Issues
refsect1.para: The LPE printed in the &default; format is not a well-formed mCRL2 specification, because it contains system defined sorts, operations and equations.

refsect1.title: Author
